adventure_overview: With their family or den, Lions learn bike safety and go on a bike ride . Bikes, training wheels, tricycles, and adaptive bikes are welcome. Prior to any activity, use Scouting America SAFE Checklist to ensure the safety of all those involved. All participants in official Scouting America activities should become familiar with the Guide to Safe Scouting and applicable program literature or manuals.
